example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 而)) (NP-SBJ (DNP (NP (PN 他们)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 喜感))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 则)) (VP (VV 来自於) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (PN 他们)) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 依旧)) (VP (VV 宝惜) (AS 著) (NP-OBJ (DP (DT 那些)) (NP (NP (ADJP (JJ 老)) (NP (NN 智慧))) (PU 、) (NP (ADJP (JJ 老)) (NP (NN 规矩))))))) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 肯) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 放手))))))))))
example.arg: 那些 老 智慧 、 老 规矩
